titles.title: What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone around Thy steps below! What patient love was seen in all Thy life and death of woe!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Forever on Thy burdened heart a weight of sorrow hung, yet no ungentle, murmuring word escaped Thy silent tongue.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O give us hearts to love like Thee!, like Thee, O Lord, to grieve far more for othersâ€™ sins than all the wrongs that we receive.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One with Thyself, may every eye in us, Thy bretheren, see the gentleness and grace that spring from union, Lord, with Thee.{/lang-eng}
